description: A React component implementing a Jira dashboard interface with project listing, project details, issue type management, issue viewing, downloading issues as CSV, and dialogs for importing and creating issues.

classes.name: LogoutButton
classes.description: A React component rendering a logout button with loading state.

classes.name: Header
classes.description: A React component rendering the dashboard header with user info and logout button.

classes.name: ProjectCard
classes.description: A React component rendering project summaries in grid or list view, with links to external Jira project pages.

classes.name: DashboardClient
classes.description: Main React component managing Jira projects, issue types, issues, dialogs, and user interactions for the dashboard.

methods.name: LogoutButton
methods.description: Handles rendering of the logout button with loading state.

methods.name: Header
methods.description: Renders the header section with user greeting and logout button.

methods.name: ProjectCard
methods.description: Displays project information in either grid or list layout.

methods.name: getExternalUrl
methods.description: Constructs external URL for a Jira project.

methods.name: DashboardClient
methods.description: Main component orchestrating project display, dialogs, and actions.
